original_text: Then Amaziah assembled the men of Judah and set them by fathers' houses under commanders of thousands and of hundreds for all Judah and Benjamin. He mustered those twenty years old and upward, and found that they were 300,000 choice men, fit for war, able to handle spear and shield.
korean_text: 아마샤가 유다 사람들을 모으고 그 여러 족속을 따라 천부장들과 백부장들을 세우되 유다와 베냐민을 함께 그리하고 이십 세 이상으로 계수하여 창과 방패를 잡고 능히 전장에 나갈 만한 자 삼십만 명을 얻고

sentences.original_text: Then Amaziah assembled the men of Judah
and set them by fathers' houses
under commanders of thousands and of hundreds
He mustered those twenty years old and upward
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이십 세 이상인 사람들을 소집했다

sentences.original_text: and found that they were 300,000 choice men
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 삼십만 명의 뽑힌 용사라는 것을 알았다

sentences.original_text: able to handle spear and shield
